info.description:
<dmsdk/extension/extension.h>

Functions for creating and controlling engine native extension libraries.
info.name: Extension

elements.description: Declare and register new extension to the engine. This macro is used to declare the extension callback functions used by the engine to communicate with the extension.

parameters.doc: symbol external extension symbol description (no quotes).
parameters.name: symbol

parameters.doc: const char* extension name. Human readable.
parameters.name: name

parameters.doc:
function(dmExtension::AppParams* app_params) app-init function. May be null.

app_params
dmExtension::AppParams* Pointer to an AppParams structure.
parameters.name: appinit

parameters.doc:
function(dmExtension::AppParams* app_params) app-final function. May be null.

app_params
dmExtension::AppParams* Pointer to an AppParams structure.
parameters.name: appfinal

parameters.doc:
function(dmExtension::Params* params) init function. May not be null.

params
dmExtension::Params* Pointer to a Params structure
parameters.name: init

parameters.doc:
function(dmExtension::Params* params) update function. May be null.

params
dmExtension::Params* Pointer to a Params structure
parameters.name: update

parameters.doc:
function(dmExtension::Params* params, const dmExtension::Event* event) event callback function. May be null.

params
dmExtension::Params* Pointer to a Params structure
event
dmExtension::Event* const Pointer to an Event structure
parameters.name: on_event

parameters.doc:
function(dmExtension::Params* params) function. May not be null.

params
dmExtension::Params* Pointer to an Params structure.
parameters.name: final

elements.examples:
Register a new extension:

DM_DECLARE_EXTENSION(MyExt, "MyExt", AppInitializeMyExt, AppFinalizeMyExt, InitializeMyExt, UpdateMyExt, OnEventMyExt, FinalizeMyExt);
elements.name: DM_DECLARE_EXTENSION

elements.description: Set if the platform is Android
elements.brief: Set if the platform is Android
elements.name: DM_PLATFORM_ANDROID

elements.description: Set if the platform is Html5
elements.brief: Set if the platform is Html5
elements.name: DM_PLATFORM_HTML5

elements.description: Set if the platform is iPhoneOS
elements.brief: Set if the platform is iPhoneOS
elements.name: DM_PLATFORM_IOS

elements.description: Set if the platform is Linux
elements.brief: Set if the platform is Linux
elements.name: DM_PLATFORM_LINUX

elements.description: Set if the platform is OSX
elements.brief: Set if the platform is OSX
elements.name: DM_PLATFORM_OSX

elements.description: Set if the platform is Windows (on both x86 and x86_64)
elements.brief: Set if the platform is Windows (on both x86 and x86_64)
elements.name: DM_PLATFORM_WINDOWS

elements.description: Activity result callback function type. Monitors events from the main activity. Used with RegisterOnActivityResultListener() and UnregisterOnActivityResultListener()
elements.name: OnActivityResult

elements.description: Registers an activity result callback. Multiple listeners are allowed.
elements.name: RegisterAndroidOnActivityResultListener

elements.description: Register extra extension callbacks.

parameters.doc: extension_callback_t Function to register as callback
parameters.name: func

returnvalues.doc: Returns true if successfully registered the function, false otherwise.
returnvalues.name: [type:bool]

elements.name: RegisterCallback

elements.description:
Register an iOS application delegate to the engine. Multiple delegates are supported (Max 32)

This function is only available on iOS.
elements.name: RegisteriOSUIApplicationDelegate

elements.description: Unregisters an activity result callback
elements.name: UnregisterAndroidOnActivityResultListener

elements.description:
Deregister a previously registered iOS application delegate

This function is only available on iOS.
elements.examples:
// myextension_ios.mm
void ExtensionAppFinalizeiOS(dmExtension::AppParams* params)
{
    dmExtension::UnregisteriOSUIApplicationDelegate(g_MyApplicationDelegate);
    [g_MyApplicationDelegate release];
    g_MyApplicationDelegate = 0;
}
elements.name: UnregisteriOSUIApplicationDelegate

elements.description: Extension application entry callback data. This is the data structure passed as parameter by extension Application entry callbacks (AppInit and AppFinalize) functions
elements.name: dmExtension::AppParams

elements.description: Extra callback enumeration for RegisterCallback function.
elements.name: dmExtension::CallbackType

elements.description: Extension event callback data. This is the data structure passed as parameter by extension event callbacks (OnEvent)
elements.name: dmExtension::Event

elements.description: Event id enumeration.
elements.name: dmExtension::EventID

elements.description: Extension callback data. This is the data structure passed as parameter by extension callbacks (Init, Finalize, Update, OnEvent)
elements.name: dmExtension::Params

elements.description: Result enumeration.
elements.name: dmExtension::Result

elements.description: Callback typedef for functions passed to RegisterCallback().
elements.name: extension_callback_t
